name: coming_soon_post_2
description: Bold, attention-grabbing Coming Soon Instagram post featuring a dramatic red background and illuminated bulb.

samples.text: Our new product launches in just a few days! Stay tuned!

fieldPrompt.text: Write your announcement text (20-80 characters) that creates excitement and anticipation. Examples: Exciting news coming soon!, Big things are on the way!, Our grand opening is almost here!. Use engaging language that builds curiosity and excitement.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear call-to-action (15-20 characters) that encourages immediate response. Examples: Join the Waitlist, Get Notified, Be the First to Know, Sign Up for Updates. Make it action-oriented and compelling.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, launch.yourbrand.com) that will be displayed below the CTA button. This provides additional credibility and drives traffic to your site.
